nushi_jimen_0005_friend_02:
Apparently this desert is home to the Quaking
Earth Titan.[npcn:6]
nushi_jimen_0005_friend_03:
Speaking of which, the ground’s been shaking off
and on and...urk...making me feel a bit sick...[npcn:6]
nushi_jimen_0005_friend_04:
Sorry, I’m gonna just sit down and rest a little
before I get back to Titan hunting...[npcn:6]
